info.game_comments: (Sarah: Next on Jeopardy!: find out everything about Alcatraz, and maybe even... how to get out of here!)

jeopardy_round: CHICKEN À LA KING SHOPPING LIST
BORN ON THE FOURTH OF JULY

(1, 1).clue: (Sarah of the Clue Crew gets put in her place on Alcatraz.)  From the Latin for "alone", it's the type of cell I've been put into, either for punishment or for my own protection

(2, 1).clue: In this sport you carry your projectiles in a quiver

(3, 1).clue: Have you been to this Georgia city?: VANNA HAS

(4, 1).clue: You may want chicken described with these 2 words, meaning the bird lived relatively unconfined

(6, 1).clue: This newsman was born on July 4, 1943, & not named Jerry Rivers

(1, 2).clue: Films made about Alcatraz include "Birdman of Alcatraz", "Escape from Alcatraz" & this 1996 Sean Connery actioner

(4, 2).clue: This fortified wine you'll cook with is in a separate section from other Spanish wines

(4, 3).clue: Weighty name for a standard ingredient in the sauce

(2, 4).clue: The projectiles fly at 150 mph & can kill in this fronton-based game

(3, 1).clue: The births of John & Jesus were heralded by this archangel
